attributes.action: Allow better benefits for women/men who wish to stay at home to raise their children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to make a petition to help Mothers/Fathers who wish to stay at home to raise their children more veasable as ta the moment it is not.  Some mothers may not wish to return to work but you can;t do this as you are not supported to stay at home.  Money is the main factor to women/men staying at home I think if at least 1 parent is working then another parent should be allowed to stay at home, being Mother or Father.  I enquired about this and was advised I would be given £150 extra on top of my tax credits if I was to stay at hime now as if that could support a family, isn't it best for a parent to raise their child not childcare, think of all the asbo's that could be saved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
